sys_script.name: Compute Days Since Last Payment

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_43643090873f625002fdeac73cbb3520
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cpszo_spoke_customer_profile</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_cpszo_spoke_customer_profile">last_payment_dateISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="last_payment_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Compute Days Since Last Payment</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, gS, gRequest, gResponse, gProcessor) {

    if (current.u_last_payment_date) {
        // Calculate difference in days
        var lastPayment = new GlideDateTime(current.u_last_payment_date);
        var today = new GlideDateTime();
        var diffMS = GlideDateTime.subtract(today, lastPayment); // duration
        var diffDays = Math.floor(diffMS.getNumericValue() / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));

        // Put it in a display-only field (not stored in DB)
        g_scratchpad.u_days_since_last_payment = diffDays;
    } else {
        g_scratchpad.u_days_since_last_payment = "N/A";
    }

})(current, g_scratchpad, g_request, g_response, g_processor);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-01 05:25:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>43643090873f625002fdeac73cbb3520</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Compute Days Since Last Payment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Spoke" source="x_cpszo_spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_43643090873f625002fdeac73cbb3520</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-01 05:29:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=43643090873f625002fdeac73cbb3520"/></record_update>
